text: “Gei goe, go tangada dangada, goe hudee madagu i digaula, be e madagu i nia kai digaula. Digaula ga hai baahi adu ge gaa hudi nadau wou adu gi di goe. Goe gaa hai gadoo be tangada dela e noho i mehanga nia ‘scorpion’. Gei goe hudee madagu i digau de hagalongo aalaa, be e madagu i nia helekai digaula ala ga helekai adu.
